name: Ebenezer Scrooge
character_summary: A miserly, cold-hearted old man whose avarice isolates him from the Christmas spirit. His journey involves two distinct looks.

looks.description: Somber, oversized black frock coat and waistcoat. Austere silhouette for Act 1 and final.
Simple white nightgown, cap, and slippers.

name: Bob Cratchit
character_summary: Scrooge's clerk, a poor but good-hearted man devoted to his family.

looks.description: Worn jacket and pants. Large, patched overcoat. Essential accessories: scarf and brimmed hat.

name: Cratchit Family (Children)
character_summary: The family of Bob Cratchit. Working class.

looks.description: Modest Victorian dress (full skirt, high neck) in neutral tones.
Simple brown dress with a white collar/apron.
Small, slightly oversized coat and trousers. MUST INCLUDE a wooden crutch.

name: Fred and Guests
character_summary: Scrooge's cheerful nephew and his social circle. Upper-middle-class.

looks.description: Tailored jacket and breeches in bright colors. Tall boots and riding crop optional.
Elaborate ball gowns with lace and full skirts. Expensive looking jewel tones (reds, emeralds).

name: Ensemble/Minor Roles
character_summary: Characters of the London streets and social interactions.

looks.description: Formal black or dark grey frock coats, top hats, and vests.
High-waisted dress in light blue or cream tones, fabrics for youthful appearance.

name: Jacob Marley
character_summary: The deceased business partner of Scrooge.

looks.description: Worn business suit with long, heavy chains and ledger attached. Visible worn binding around the jaw.
Corpse-like makeup: pale white base with heavy black shadowing around eyes and cheeks.

name: Ghost of Christmas Past
character_summary: The first of the three spirits, representing memory and the innocence of Scrooge's youth.

looks.description: Translucent white/silver fabrics with heavy drapery.
Heavy white foundation, iridescent powder, and light blue/silver contouring.

name: Ghost of Christmas Present
character_summary: A giant, jovial spirit representing the current Christmas season.

looks.description: Green velvet or wool robe, trimmed in white fur/trim.

name: Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come
character_summary: The silent, ominous phantom showing Scrooge the consequences.

looks.description: Black, heavy draped cloak with hood. Minimal details.
